thread.title: Startup Businesses Set-Up Tax Calculations with Updated EzPaycheck Software with Ease
thread.title_full: Startup Businesses Set-Up Tax Calculations with Updated EzPaycheck Software with Ease

author: Tammie Bernard
title: Startup Businesses Set-Up Tax Calculations with Updated EzPaycheck Software with Ease
text:
Startup companies are extremely satisfied with the new features in the updated version of EzPaycheck 2015 payroll software from Halfpricesoft.com . The enhanced interface is straightforward and easy to understand with new form level help buttons. Business owners can confidently process payroll checks including tax calculations without worry. “ezPaycheck allows startup companies to pay employees on time and correctly with tax calculation setup features.” said Dr. Ge, the founder of Halfpricesoft.com.
Available at: http://www.halfpricesoft.com/index.asp , the latest version of this popular and easy-to-use software is priced at just $89 per installation per calendar year, making ezPaycheck payroll software affordable for any size business.
Small to mid-size businesses appreciate the unique features in the latest release of ezPaycheck payroll software:
Supports daily, weekly, biweekly, semimonthly and monthly payroll periods. Features report functions, print functions, and pay stub functions. Easily calculates differential pay
Prints miscellaneous checks as well as payroll calculation checks.
Prints payroll checks on blank computer checks or preprinted checks.
Automatically calculates Federal Withholding Tax, Social Security, Medicare Tax and Employer Unemployment Taxes.
-Includes built-in tax tables for all 50 states and the District of Columbia.
Creates and maintains payrolls for multiple companies, and does it simultaneously. Prints Tax Forms 940, 941, W-2 and W-3.
-Supports multiple accounts at no additional charge.
-Supports network access.
Priced at $89 per calendar year for customers, ezPaycheck payroll software is affordable for any size business. To start the no obligation 30-day test drive today, please visit http://www.halfpricesoft.com/index.asp
About Halfpricesoft.com
Founded in 2003, Halfpricesoft.com has established itself as a leader in meeting and exceeding the software requirements of small businesses around the world. Offering payroll software, employee attendance tracking software, check writing/printing software, W2 software, 1099 software and ezACH deposit software. It continues to grow in the philosophy that small business owners deserve affordable, user friendly, and totally risk-free software.
